name: Ryan's Ranch: The Movie: The Game
name_original: Ryan's Ranch: The Movie: The Game
description:
An all-american restaurant game where you cook steaks with your gun and make your companion serve them with his spindly parasitic arms. 

This game is loosely based on SuperMegaCast Ep 112: Ryans Ranch: The Movie. Hopefully it takes about 45 min to play from start to finish, and hopefully you've been watching Supermega for 3 years to catch these outdated references.

Features a fishing minigame!!

This game is my first completed project. I can only vouch for Windows because I have no Mac to test it on, but I threw it up anyway. It has no save or options so god help you. If this game does not softlock during your playthrough, I will have considered it a triumph.

Please leave your game breaking bugs in the comments section.
